com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations

Class DefaultSequenceGraphFactories.SingleSequenceScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations.DefaultSequenceGraphFactories.SingleSequenceScorer
  • Enclosing class:
    DefaultSequenceGraphFactories

    public abstract static class DefaultSequenceGraphFactories.SingleSequenceScorer
extends Object
    Provides methods to supply a score for a given sequence residue and provide a color for a given score.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultSequenceGraphFactories.SingleSequenceScorer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Color getColor(double score)
      return a Color for a score.
      abstract Double getScore(char residue)
      return the score for this residue The implementation must be thread safe as this method may be called simulataneously from multiple threads.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultSequenceGraphFactories.SingleSequenceScorer

        public DefaultSequenceGraphFactories.SingleSequenceScorer()

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        public abstract Double getScore(char residue)
        return the score for this residue The implementation must be thread safe as this method may be called simulataneously from multiple threads.
        Parameters:
        residue - the residue to be scored.
        Returns:
        the score between 0 and 1 inclusive for this residue or null if this residue does not have a score.

      • getColor

        public abstract Color getColor(double score)
        return a Color for a score. The score is not necessarily one returned by getScore(char) (for example in an graph averaged over multiple sequences or over multiple residue sites)
        Parameters:
        score - the score between 0 and 1 inclusive.
        Returns:
        the Color for this score.
